# SPLUNK
Demonstration with screenshots showing Splunk experience

I installed Windows Server 2022 on a VM and downloaded the SIEM Splunk, to demonstrate working knowledge.

##### Utilities Used
 
 - Windows Server 2022

 - Splunk
 
 ##### Environments Used
 - VMWare
 - Windows 10
